snippet: Panicos Demetriades is expected to be appointed to head Cyprus’s central bank, even though he says Germany should leave the euro zone.
abstract: Fight over leadership of the Cypriot central bank could have repercussions throughout the European Union; Cyprus's left-wing Pres Demetris Christofias is expected to appoint a new leader for the bank, economist Panicos Demetriades, who has called for Germany to leave the euro zone.
lead_paragraph: Panicos Demetriades is expected to be appointed to head Cyprus’s central bank, even though he says Germany should leave the euro zone.

headline.main: Provocative Views Seen in the Wings
headline.print_headline: Provocative Views Seen In the Wings
